description:
A lazy man becomes rich with the help of a god. A raccoon gathers donations for a temple.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daikoku-sama and Denzaburou the Rich Man / The Tanuki Priest and Kenchin Soup
Daikoku-sama to Denzaburou Chouja / Tanuki Oshou to Kenchinjiru
大黒さまと伝三郎長者 / たぬき和尚とけんちん汁
